can you review this page and find the file I need to do the CLTD CLF 
tell me which to click: [[[ Artificial intelligence (AI) policy: ASHRAE prohibits the entry of content from any ASHRAE publication or related ASHRAE intellectual property (IP) into any AI tool, including but not limited to ChatGPT. ASHRAE Standards Addenda, Errata, and Interpretations
Addenda for ASHRAE Standards, including continuous maintenance standards, are available online in PDF format. Standards that are on continuous maintenance are continuously updated through addenda and ASHRAE makes these available free online.
Addenda

When it is determined that a published standard, guideline, code, or user's manual contains an error or errors, an errata sheet may be published at the discretion of the Manager of Standards.
Errata

A request for interpretation may be either 'official' or 'unofficial' (personal).
Interpretations

Preview ASHRAE Standards and Guidelines
You may preview the following ASHRAE Standards & Guidelines with the links below. The link will allow you to viewing access to your selection with the option to purchase your copy with the buy button.  If you need technical support, please contact iEngineering at ashrae@iengineering.com.

The file you need to perform **CLTD/CLF (Cooling Load Temperature Difference / Cooling Load Factor) calculations** is:

✅ **ASHRAE Standard 183-2024 – Peak Cooling and Heating Load Calculations in Buildings Except Low-Rise Residential Buildings**

You should click on:

- **Standard 183-2024**, under the section **"Current Popular ASHRAE Standards and Guidelines"** or
- **Standard 183-2007 (RA 2020)** under the section **"Standards and Guidelines Referenced in Code"**.

The latest standard (183-2024) is recommended since it's the most recent and comprehensive version.
